archimate:BusinessObject.name: ResourceRoleDetails
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
"This class implements the semantics of the ResourceTakesOnRoles aggregation. It also serves as the parent class for defining the classes that implement the RolesDescribePhysicalResource, RolesDescribeLogicalResource, and RolesDescribeCompoundResource aggregations. These three classes are named RolesDescribePhysicalResourceDetails, RolesDescribeLogicalResourceDetails, and RolesDescribeCompoundResourceDetailsm respectively.
These four classes are defined in the system view of the DEN-ng specification. "
